item.description:
Wildcat's free learn to snowboard lesson deal is now active, check out.

http://www.skiwildcat.com/whats-happening.html?id=5292

The deal includes rental, lesson and a novice lift tickets. This is NOT off the skiNH.com web site. please call Wildcat.

To register for the free Learn2 package, Participants must call Wildcat Mountain at (603) 466-3326 extension 217

The deal will sell out quickly so please book your spot ASAP, within a day.  Please add a comment and let us know if you got in on the  deal.

I plan also host a weekend at the Wedeln Ski Club that same weekend.  People can either do a day trip to Wildcat or stay over night at the Wedeln Ski club (www.wedeln.com). more details to come.

We will meet on the top floor of the main base lode at 8:30am.  The more experienced riders can go out for a few runs and the beginners can get their gear for the lesson.  We will pick a time and place for lunch and enjoy a little pares at the end of the day.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a red jacket.
item.name: Free Learn to Snowboard
